Producer: Daisy Allsop, Osnat Handelsman-Keren, Talia Kleinhendler, Hannah Leader
Production Co: United King Films, MFC Productions., Pie Films, Big Book Media, Universal Studios, Archface Films, Media Finance Capital
Synopsis: Andie MacDowell stars as a famous actor who goes incognito to seek treatment for a medical issue. While at the hospital, she meets three unique and remarkable women -- an aging rocker, a young mother, and a forever single retired schoolteacher. Together, they help her face adversity with humor and camaraderie while coaching her for the most challenging role she has ever played... herself.
Title: My Happy Ending
